name: The only way to go is up
name_original: The only way to go is up
description:
A very short story that each of us has a head full of problems. Many of them are not worth dwelling on, and it is better to just go ahead.

The game is made for Mini Jam 128: Health

credits

Thanks to ledoux for such a wonderful tool as Bitsy. Thanks to ruin for Pixsy and mark wonnacott for add bitsy audio
